flawed_nl_solution:
After one year it earns $10 in interest because 100 x 0.1 = <<100*0.1=10.0>>10.0
It has $120 in it after a year because 100 + 10.0 + 10 = <<100+10.0+10=120.0>>120.0
In the second year it earns $12 in interest because 120.0 x 0.1 = <<120.0*0.1=21.0>>21.0
In the second year it has $142 in it because 120.0 + 21.0 + 10 = <<120.0+21.0+10=151.0>>151.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12.0, not 21.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
